author: kkolinko
msg: When running with a SecurityManager, make sure that reference to a Servlet instance is removed from a static cache when its init() or destroy() methods fail.

author: kkolinko
msg: Merged revisions r1428993 r1429167 from tomcat/trunk:
Align implementation between IS_SECURITY_ENABLED==true and ==false branches.
(The difference is i18n and Error handling).
2. in ApplicationFilterConfig constructor and ApplicationFilterConfig.setFilterDef() method:
Remove the setFilterDef() method and inline the code into the constructor.
(This avoids the need to fix the filter destruction code in setFilterDef() which is actually never called).
The removed method has package visibility, so there should not be any 3rd-party callers.

author: brett
msg: fix links to a number of downloads when using a mirror
